mapper.insert: insert into students(userid, password, name, ssn, reg_date, subject) values(#{userid}, #{password}, #{name}, #{ssn}, #{regDate}, #{subject})
mapper.select: select stu_num stuNum, userid, password, name, ssn, reg_date regDate, subject, profile_image profileImage from students
mapper.update: update students set subject = #{subject} where userid like #{userid}
mapper.delete: delete from students where userid like #{userid}
